item.title: Sally Smith ’02
item.dc:creator: chris
item.description: TitleLocation Currently working as a UI designer and front-end web developer at Google. Previously head of Interactive at Ikayzo. Experience assisting local organizations with telling their story across the digital landscape and providing clients with streamlined, end-to-end creative solutions that match their digital & technical challenges.
